descriptionHtml:
This mod places over 120ish followers to skyrim. they are all pc mult 1. so they lvl with the player. they are killable. to many for them not to be killable.

Only reason im adding this mod here is because my steam version is full on limit and its kinda Crapped itself over on steam.

Plus there are some bugs on the steam version I cant fix since its limit has been hit.

Some of these followers use a non follower voice.
There is a mod here on the nexus called additional Follower voices. get that.
author: My Jiggy
